response.original_title: Duff Mckagan's - Tenderness : Live In Los Angeles
response.overview: FROM DUFF: "This live recording from the El Rey in Los Angeles showcases not only the songs on the record, but some cover songs we started to fold into the live set as we toured. Weâ€™ve highlighted a couple tracks from this show-TENDERNESS being one of course, and our version of the MAD SEASON song RIVER OF DECEIT. Such a beautiful song written by guys from back home that I know now, and a couple who are no longer with us. It feels like a celebration to me. All of these live shows we did on that tour felt like a shedding, a prayer to better things, and a beautiful coming together of all you bad motherfuckers."
response.title: Duff Mckagan's - Tenderness : Live In Los Angeles
